data.title: ROAMIN’ IN THE GLOAMIN’ – Fondazione Sozzani
data.text:
ROAMIN’ IN THE GLOAMIN’

ASCEND BEYOND X NOIA MAGAZINE

ON VIEW

FROM SATURDAY 27 TO SUNDAY MAY 28,2023, FROM 11.30AM TO 7.30PM

FONDAZIONE SOZZANI

VIA ENRICO TAZZOLI 3, MILANO

WORKSHOP

SATURDAY MAY 27, 2023 DALLE 11.30 ALLE 16.00

BY RESERVATION ONLY

FREE SEWING SESSION

SATURDAY MAY 27, 2023 AT 5.00PM

FREE ENTRY

WITH

EMANUELE ABBONDANZA, ASCEND BEYOND CO-FOUNDER AND CREATIVE DIRECTOR

LORENZO BIGATTI, NOIA MAGAZINE CREATIVE DIRECTOR AND EDITOR

FILIPPO COLOMBO, ASCEND BEYOND ILLUSTRATOR

GAIA CARNEVALE, ASCEND BEYOND CREATIVE STRATEGIST

IRENE DILIBERTO, ASCEND BEYOND ART

IRENE FABBRI, DESIGNER FREELANCE

MARCO GROSSI, ASCEND BEYOND CO-FOUNDER

PAOLO CEREGHINI, ASCEND BEYOND PARTNER

FONDAZIONE SOZZANI presents Roamin’ in the Gloamin’, aN artistic event by Ascend Beyond in collaboration with NOIA Magazine dedicated to sustainability which involves some young collectives and emerging projects from Milan committed to promoting sustainability in design, fashion and music.

On Saturday 27 May, from 11.30AM to 4.00PM, an upcycling workshop with limited capacity invites participants to create their own Looking for Clues Bag, a personalized bag designed and engineered for the occasion by the Ascend Beyond team and Irene Fabbri, using fine materials stock, second and third picks by NT Majocchi. The workshop, with a limited number, requires subscription and advance booking.

At 5.00PM, during Sewing the Frolicking with the Guys Labels, participants will be presented with three limited edition jacquard labels designed by Lorenzo Boero and Alice Guarnieri that can be sewn free of charge on a garment of your choice.

At 7.00PM THE LAUNCH OF Tableaux-Pièges, A book edited by NOIA Publishing which collects the ideas of some emerging realities on the Milanese scene during a dinner WITH A talk about sustainability and new production scenarios and to share skills and knowledge. The projects involved, alongside Ascend Beyond and NOIA Magazine, are Rayon Vert, Slip mode and 0331.
